name: Terminal Theme for IRCCloud
description: The terminal theme for IRCCloud that I know everyone's been waiting for!
additional_info:
The terminal theme for IRCCloud that I know everyone's been waiting for!
Please let me know (kirb in the IRCCloud #themes channel) if something isn't themed; I'll fix it :)

Note: IRCCloud Beta probably works with this theme, but I won't fix any problems with it - everyone will be on the alpha release soon anyway.

Changelog:
2.0: Code beautified and cleaned up; themed basically all unthemed elements; Source Code Pro and Inconsolata font support
1.1.4.3: Added support for Menlo, a nicer monospace font on OS X
1.1.4.2: Another fix for the validator
1.1.4.1: Minor fix to satisfy userstyles.org's style validator
1.1.4: More various fixes; improvements to the sidebar styling
1.1.3: Various fixes
1.1.2: Fixes mode being white in user info popups
1.1.1: Add a few styles I missed for the collapsed join/part list
1.1: Support for IRCCloud alpha; themes popups, adds monospace fonts for buttons and text boxes
1.0.4: Adds an orange background when the connection is lost
1.0.3: Also run theme on www.irccloud.com (thanks to Lara for reporting this)
1.0.2: Themes the "request an invite" page
1.0.1: Themes the "add network" page
1.0: Initial release
